text:
Hi guys,

I'd like to export some old Drag and Drop templates from a HubSpot instance and import them in another one. I can't seem to find any info on how to do this. Would the HubSpot CLI help with this? Is there another way of doing it?

The idea is that I'd like to work with that old Drag and Drop Template and change it a bit on a different dev account than the live one.
hey guys, is there any chance to get all authors including their images in one custom module (our client wants a slider with all authors in it)
